arm_group.description: Operating room will be maintained at 30% oxygenation during colorectal surgery.
Operating room will be maintained at 80% oxygenation during colorectal surgery.

brief_summary.textblock:
Our primary objective is to develop a clinical pathway for care of patients having
      colorectal surgery at the Clinic. In particular, the investigators would like to determine
      what intraoperative concentration of oxygen is optimal in our patients. The investigators
      therefore propose to test the primary hypothesis that supplemental oxygen (80% versus 30%)
      reduces the risk of a composite of surgical sites infection and potentially oxygen-related
      wound complications. Secondarily, the investigators will assess the incremental cost benefit
      of 80% versus 30% oxygen. As a safety measure, enough oxygen will always be given to
      maintain oxygen saturation (as determined by pulse oximetry) ≥95%.

clinical_study.brief_title: Supplemental Oxygen in Colorectal Surgery: A Quality Improvement Project

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  adult colorectal surgical patients

intervention.description: Operating room will be maintained at 30% oxygenation during colorectal surgery.
Operating room will be maintained at 80% oxygenation.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Our primary objective is to develop a clinical pathway for care of patients having colo-rectal surgery at the Clinic. In particular, we would like to determine what intraoperative concentration of supplemental oxygen (30% or 80%)is optimal in our patients. As a safety measure, enough oxygen will always be given to maintain oxygen saturation (as determined by pulse oximetry) ≥95%.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

secondary_outcome.description: Secondarily, we will assess the incremental cost benefit of 80% versus 30% oxygen
secondary_outcome.measure: cost benefit analysis for oxygen concentration
